content:
I've been working with v5.2.1 of the validator, testing the new proxy options. While I can get it to work, I'm not happy about having to enter my credentials in clear text on the command line. I need to do this because our proxy requires authorization (Basic or NTLM). I'm wondering why retrieving from http://packages.fhir.org/hl7.terminology supports NTLM, while retrieving http://tx.fhir.org/r4/metadata?_summary=true only supports Basic. Can the validator support the same access options for both resources?

Thanks ... Charlie
